recipes.minimum_distance¶

recipes.minimum_distance¶

NAME:

minimum_distance

PURPOSE:

Find distance to each point’s nearest neighbour

INPUT:

x=[x,y,z].T

OUTPUT:

distance to nearest neighbour

HISTORY:

2019 - Written - Webb (UofT)
